Header: Go Rights Lawyers' Collective lodges a complaint at the CID
Content: Go Rights Lawyersâ€™ Collective has lodged a complaint at the CID today regarding the killing of 27 inmates at Welikada Prison on the 9th of November 2012. Chief Organizer of the collective Attorney-at-law Senaka Perera stated that they will intervene to mete out justice for the victims of the incident.
